entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:28 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 09:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
